content.question: int[] arr = {4, 3, 2, 1, 0};int total = 0;for (int k = 0; k <= total; k++){if (arr[k] % 2 == 0){total += arr[k];}else{total -= arr[k];}}System.out.print(total);What, if anything, is printed as a result of executing the code segment?

choices.label: Nothing is printed because the code segment causes a runtime error.

skill.text: 3.B: Determine the result or output based on code that contains data abstractions.
